projects.title: Digging sites and their Capacity Maps
projects.description: Project description. MERN Stack is using with leaflet js and OSM. It displays all of the digging work done in the choosen time frame in the form slide. 1) Legends for better understanding 2) Time slide to display progress in the chosen time frame 3) Drop down menu to choose time frame.

projects.title: Morgan Fertlity USA locations Map
projects.description: Project description. Interactive webmap displaying all of the locations of Morgan Fertility in USA. 1) Firstly the data was extracted using google places api 2) Google Map API was used for Web map developement 3) Google sheets API was used as substitute to the database

projects.title: Automatic Building footprints finding Model
projects.description: Project description. This is a Deep learning Model that takes Satellite imageries, run the model on it and return shapefile of all the building footprint extracted via Satellite imagery

projects.title: Atlanta Vehicle related crime map
projects.description: Project description. WordPress map displaying all of the Vehicle related crimes committed in Atlanta. Map is using Real time API from Atlanta police official website to extract, clean and filter out all the crimes and displaying it on mapbox map displayed on WordPress

projects.title: Web Dashboard with Interactive MAP tools for Aerux Broadband
projects.description: Project description. Client: Aerux Broadband - A Leader in Broadband Services üëî üöÄ Project Overview: Mapping a Connected Future üöÄ The focal point of this initiative is a dynamic web map meticulously crafted to streamline and optimize Aerux's operational framework: 1Ô∏è‚É£ MERN Stack Admin Dashboard Developed using Leaflet JS, this sophisticated dashboard empowers administrators to delineate polygons, facilitating the assignment of distinct offers, speeds, and pricing structures to specific geographical areas
projects.extra_description: Client: Aerux Broadband - A Leader in Broadband Services üëî üöÄ Project Overview: Mapping a Connected Future üöÄ The focal point of this initiative is a dynamic web map meticulously crafted to streamline and optimize Aerux's operational framework: 1Ô∏è‚É£ MERN Stack Admin Dashboard Developed using Leaflet JS, this sophisticated dashboard empowers administrators to delineate polygons, facilitating the assignment of distinct offers, speeds, and pricing structures to specific geographical areas. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Vector Editing Tool A robust vector editing tool has been implemented to enable seamless modification of polygons, facilitating the expeditious adjustment of offers and other essential parameters. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Map Views Toggle To enhance user experience, the system offers a toggle feature, allowing users to seamlessly switch between street map and satellite views. This ensures a comprehensive understanding of the service areas. 4Ô∏è‚É£ MEAN Stack Public-Side Search Bar Utilizing MapBox, a sophisticated search bar on the public side has been implemented, affording customers the ability to easily identify available internet offers in their respective areas, fostering transparency and informed decision-making.
media: /projects/company-project-assets/Web Dashboard with Interactive MAP tools for Aerux Broadband.mp4

projects.title: REACT Leaflet js Map for UK Seaports
projects.description: Project description. A dynamic React-based web map that visualizes sea routes and provides insightful details about sea ports in the United Kingdom! üåü Client Review: "Badar is a great React dev and GIS analyst He is fast and delivers on time. Discuss the requirements to a T beforehand so you both are on the same page." üó∫Ô∏èüõ†Ô∏è Project Highlights: 1)Interactive Web Map: Utilized React JS and Leaflet mapping library to create an engaging map displaying sea routes and ports.
projects.extra_description: A dynamic React-based web map that visualizes sea routes and provides insightful details about sea ports in the United Kingdom! üåü Client Review: "Badar is a great React dev and GIS analyst. He is fast and delivers on time. Discuss the requirements to a T beforehand so you both are on the same page." üó∫Ô∏èüõ†Ô∏è Project Highlights: 1)Interactive Web Map: Utilized React JS and Leaflet mapping library to create an engaging map displaying sea routes and ports. 2) Detailed Information on Click/Hover: Enhanced user experience by incorporating features that provide real-time data 3) Clicking on a port or hovering over a route reveals the number of ships and gross tonnes transported daily. 4) Visual Data Representation: The thickness of the route visually represents the number of ships, while the color indicates the gross tonnes being carried‚Äîoffering an intuitive understanding of maritime activities. 5) Customizable Ship Details: Implemented a top menu allowing users to choose and display specific ship details, providing a comprehensive view tailored to individual preferences.

projects.title: Interactive Map for Headstone World Houston

Interactive Pop-ups: - On-click pop-ups providing detailed information about each cemetery. - Downloadable PDF files related to specific cemetery details. 3. Search Functionality: - A user-friendly search bar enabling users to easily find specific cemeteries. 4.

projects.title: 3d Map of Noise Compaint in NYC
projects.description: Project description. Administrative boundry of NYC was downloaded from DIVA GIS and extracted in ArcGIS. Dataset of Noise Complaint was downloaded from online source. The map was made and designed using ArcGIS
media: /projects/company-project-assets/3d Map of Noise Compaint in NYC.png

projects.title: Noise Complain Map of Manhattan
projects.description: Project description. Dataset was collected from an online source. Adminstrative Boundary was downloaded from DIVA GIS and Manhattan was extracted out in ArcGIS Made this map on ArcGIS using Hexagonal binning method.

projects.title: NYC Population Density Map
projects.description: Project description. I made a population density map of NYC that shows the correlation between population 65 years and older and Population under 18 years of age. Dataset was taken from open sources on internet and map was made using ArcGIS

projects.title: Site Suitability Analysis for Environment Awareness Centre
projects.description: Project description. I did Site Suitability Analysis as a challenge project for Environment Awareness Centre Data was collected from Open Street Map Cleaning was done on ArcGIS Ring Buffer was Applied on different Attributes according to requirement Weighted Overlay was done to get the end result
